title: Disable Pixel 2 Call End Beep
content:
When a call hangs up I get an incredibly loud beep, regardless of volume setting. It's so loud the sound is distorted (e.g. top end of speaker power/sound output).

I have tried disabling the microphone permission as per this: https://support.google.com/pixelphone/thread/9476624?hl=en

I don't have snapchat (as per the 2017 bug). 

My 'SIM Toolkit' doesn't have any permissions to disable.

I don't mind a little, gentle tone. But this thing is INSANE.
